title: Vote for April Goal of the Month
body_text:
April saw another bumper month of great goals scored by our various teams, and you can now select your Goal of the Month.
There is a great mixture of netbusters, from individual efforts, excellent displays of teamwork and some fine set-pieces, with nine to choose from across our men’s, women’s and academy sides.
Here are the contenders:
- Gabriel Jesus completing a neat passing move against Leeds United
- Granit Xhaka converting a fine header against the Whites
- Katie McCabe's rocket into the top corner against Manchester City
- Michal Rosiak’s excellent free-kick against Manchester City U18s
- Amario Cozier-Duberry’s run and curler against Brighton & Hove Albion U21s
- Martin Odegaard’s well-taken volley at West Ham United
- Rafaelle’s header to give us hope at Wolfsburg
- Stina Blackstenius finishing off a great team goal in the same game
- Ethan Nwaneri’s mazy dribble and finish against Aston Villa U18s
Take a look at our video above to see all these great strikes again, and then cast your vote below to select your favourite:
